title: agreement
description: A set of required signatures signifying an agreement.

agentIDs.description: The agents which are required in order to sign the document

question.description: When prompting an agent, what are they agreeing to?

timeout.description: ISO 8601 deadline after which the agreement expires and no more signatures are accepted.

quorum.description: Minimum number of signatures required for the agreement to be considered complete (M-of-N). If omitted, all agents in agentIDs must sign.

requiredAlgorithms.description: If specified, only signatures using one of these algorithms are accepted.

minimumStrength.description: Minimum cryptographic strength tier required for signatures. 'classical' accepts any algorithm; 'post-quantum' requires pq-dilithium or pq2025.
